title: Sifec North
author: ''
date: '2022-11-16'
slug: sifec_north

tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $286.2K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Sifec North. The average
  contract duration was 1.38 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $407.4K. The longest
  contract was 4.94 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $2.1M.
lookup_name: 'SIFEC NORTH'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '286.2K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '13'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '7'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '54%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '172%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2.71'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '1.8M'
s424_mean_duration: '1.38'
s421_mean_contract_value: '407.4K'
s425_max_duration: '4.94'
s422_max_contract_value: '2.1M'
---
